dc_title_s: Democratic Republic of the Congo National Boundaries
dc_description_s: The Democratic Republic of the Congo national boundaries from The Multipurpose Africover Database for the Environmental Resources produced by the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO). Scale of the dataset: 1:200,000. National boundaries have been taken from the DCW dataset.
dc_creator_sm: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
Congo (Democratic Republic). Ministere de l'environnement. Service Permanent d'Inventaire et d'Amenagement Forestier
dc_publisher_s: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard College Library
